rules_text:
Indestructible
[i]Jade Mane[/i] – Whenever Soan, Tellius Hero enters or attacks, creatures you control get +X/+X, where X is Soan's power. Until end of turn, whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put two +1/+1 counters onto Soan.
[i]Ashera's Chosen – [/i]Soan can't be blocked by creatures with lesser power.
[i]Beast Tribe Herald[/i] – Non-Human creature spells you cast have riot.
